description:
This is a complete course to teach you how to stop intrusive thoughts and images

It uses Cognitive Behavioural Therapy - CBT, and

Mindfulness Based Stress Reduction

It focuses on, for example

Intrusive thoughts regarding your sexuality

Intrusive thoughts women can have

Intrusive thoughts men can have

Aggressive intrusive thoughts

The course replicates what you would get from me if you saw me in person, but you have the added benefit of having access to professional help in a discreet way.

You have LifeTime access to this course, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week!

My course is to take the fear out of intrusive thoughts, and to let you see them for what they are.

Having an understanding of how you can have these thoughts in the first place is half the battle!
title: Stop Intrusive Thoughts and Images
